channel.title: Having trouble getting people on my server
channel.description: I'm having trouble getting 'other' people on my server. I can get on it fine using IP 192.168.2.136 (feel free to try it) but other people cannot get on my server... If u know the problem im having please help me.

item.title: Having trouble getting people on my server
item.dc:creator: @newton37 newton37
item.description:
@newton37 wrote:

i tried port forwarding nothing happened… i just got a new new IP which is 192.168.2.136 before it was 192.168.2.2…

Read full topic
item.source: Having trouble getting people on my server

item.title: Having trouble getting people on my server
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

Check your current firewall and router port blocking settings. This is most likely to be your problem.

Read full topic
